ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and indeed he bears witness to that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And is himself witness to it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and he himself is a witness to that,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He himself knows this very well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed he himself is a witness to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And to that He bears witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely he is a witness of that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and surely he is a witness against that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! he is a witness unto that;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He himself bears witness to that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily to that he is witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed he is [himself] witness to that!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And to that (fact) he bears witness (by his deeds);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And to that fact he bears witness (by his deeds);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To this he himself shall bear witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And he bears witness to that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [100:7] and verily to that, ingratitude of his, he is a witness, bearing witness against himself to his own actions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! he is a witness unto that) and Allah records His doing;
